channel.title: Introduction on Rails Network FAQ
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Rails Network FAQ

item.title: Adding Rails Network to MetaMask
item.description: Adding Rails Network to MetaMask # On smartphones: Open MetaMask and tap on the network list at the top of the app. Press Add Network. Select Custom Network tab. In this dialog, use the following variables: Network Name: Rails Network RPC URL: https://mainnet.steamexchange.io Currency Symbol: STEAMX Chain ID: 6278 Explorer: https://explore.steamexchange.io Then click on Add to have our network in your Network list. On extension: Open MetaMask extension and tap on the network list at the top-left of the app.

item.title: Migrate from BSC to Rails
item.description: How to Migrate SteamX Tokens from BSC to Rails Network # Migrating your tokens from BSC to Rails network is a straightforward process. You can watch a video tutorial on how to do it or follow these easy steps: Use a Compatible Wallet: Ensure you are using a compatible wallet. We strongly recommend MetaMask. If you already have SteamX (BSC) tokens in another wallet, you can import your Seed Phrase into MetaMask and continue using the other wallet.

item.title: What is SteamX
item.description: Steam Exchange, a pioneering Canadian Fintech startup established in 2021, stands at the forefront of the rapidly evolving landscape of cryptocurrency, blockchain technology, and web2 to web3 integrations. Our core values revolve around fostering a culture of continuous learning, driving innovation, and offering scalable digital asset solutions. As a registered corporation in Canada, we are committed to reshaping the way value is exchanged by leveraging cutting-edge technologies and a unique hybrid model that harmonizes elements from both centralized and decentralized financial ecosystems.
This page is hidden in menu #
